about: MIS-trained data engineer moving into data science. I build reliable pipelines, tighten data quality, and ship ML that actually improves decisions—backed by Snowflake, AWS, and Python.

projects.name: Grant Allocation Prediction
projects.summary: Built regression models with stratified k-fold CV to estimate grant allocation outcomes.
projects.impact: Precision improved from 0.37 to 0.45 via feature engineering and RMSE-tuned hyperparameters.
highlights: Feature engineering on multi-source civic datasets
K-fold CV with held-out cycles for realistic validation

projects.name: Revenue Anomaly Detection
projects.summary: Ensemble anomaly detection across 5D revenue signals.
projects.impact: False positives cut from 8% to 5.2%; triage speed up 35%.
highlights: Combined z-score normalization with Isolation Forest
Explainable flags surfaced in BI for operations
Tight feedback loop with program officers

projects.name: XML-to-Warehouse ETL
projects.summary: Incremental XML parsing pipeline with taxonomy normalization.
projects.impact: Processed 57K XML docs; QA cycle time dropped from 3h to 25m; 420 data tests added.
highlights: Automated data quality gates in dbt

projects.name: Agentic RAG with Local LLM
projects.summary: ReAct agent + RAG for local, tool-augmented document QA.
projects.impact: 90%+ accuracy and sub-2s median response locally.

experience.description: Own ML modeling, data quality, and civic analytics to guide equitable funding decisions.
achievements: Lifted model precision 0.37 → 0.45 using stratified CV and tuned regressors
Cut anomaly false positives to 5.2% and sped up triage by 35%
Built XML ingestion to Snowflake; added 420 dbt tests; duplicates down 86%
Shipped Power BI views exposing $2.3M funding gaps for neighborhood reallocations

experience.description: Raised system observability and reliability across Azure workloads.
achievements: Unified Azure telemetry dashboards; anomaly detection time down 45%
Deployed ELK for real-time traces; issue triage 30% faster
Automated daily infra checks; sustained 99.5% SLA

experience.description: Scaled telemetry pipelines and forecasting to stabilize peak configuration loads.
achievements: EMR migration cut batch runtime 8h → 2h and costs by 20%
Time-series forecasting improved peak resource allocation by 35%
Prometheus/CloudWatch reduced job failures 20 → 2; faster recovery

experience.description: Delivered intraday risk data flows and entity matching at scale.
achievements: Kinesis/Redshift ingestion for 1.2M daily positions; CPU <70%
Random forest exposures with walk-forward R²=0.87 (20-day horizon)
Airflow + Lambda reduced schema mismatch errors by 40%

education.institution: Malaviya National Institute of Technology (MNIT) Jaipur
